title: Reminder!
body: Have you checked your shopping list for today?

title: Shopping Time!
body: Now would be a good time to go through your list.

title: Don't Forget!
body: You wanted to shop today - is everything on the list?

title: Planning Made Easy
body: Plan your shopping in advance with your list.

title: Have you bought everything?
body: A quick look at your list won't hurt.

title: Update Your List?
body: Reminder: Check if you want to add anything.

title: Last Chance!
body: The day is ending - have you done your shopping?
